personalInfo.name: Jiahua Duojie
personalInfo.title: Data Engineer | Full-Stack Developer | AI Enthusiast

profileSummary: Experienced Data Scientist & Full-Stack Web Developer with a strong foundation in .NET and Node.js frameworks. Adept at developing cloud-based data pipelines, data warehouses, and deploying machine learning models into production. Skilled with modern ML frameworks including TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Specializes in integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to create cognitive solutions that address complex real-world challenges.

education.institution: Lucerne University of Applied Science and Art, Lucerne

Data warehouse and visualization of Swiss shared mobility
Master thesis project: Development of a tourism data chatbot to access and interact with complex data
